title: ‘Bidenflation': A Planned Crisis or Democrat Incompetence? | Guests: Jonathan Isaac & AG Daniel Cameron | 6/1/22
description:
Joy Behar of "The View" spoke out against guns and compared it to child grooming, so Glenn explains who’s doing the actual child grooming. As inflation worsens, the White House continues to make excuses, and Glenn and Stu discuss the real cause of inflation: government spending. Kentucky Attorney General Daniel Cameron explains how ESG scores will never take hold in his state. Blaze podcast host Daniel Horowitz joins to expose the WHO’s latest power grab despite having no authority. CEO and co-founder of the Federalist Sean Davis joins to discuss the acquittal of formal Clinton lawyer Michael Sussmann. NBA player and author of “Why I Stand” Jonathan Isaac joins to discuss his new book and why he refused both kneeling and the vaccine.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
